thread.title: Van Gaal: Arsenal is technically the Premier League's best
thread.title_full: Van Gaal: Arsenal is technically the Premier League's best

author: Mountain lion perched on power pole captured in rare photo
title: Van Gaal: Arsenal is technically the Premier League's best
text:
Van Gaal: Arsenal is technically the Premier League's best Goal.com 2 hrs ago Â© Provided by Goal.com Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal has described Arsenal as the best "technical and tactical" team in the Premier League ahead of the clubs' meeting Sunday.
AdChoices The league leaders travel to the Emirates Stadium for a crucial clash and the Dutchman acknowledged the quality of his side's opponents.
But he did say Arsenal needed to improve, as the club should have won more in recent years given the quality Gunners manager Arsene Wenger has at his disposal.
"Arsenal are technically and tactically the best team in the league," said the 64-year-old. "Nevertheless, they haven't won so much, so you have to look for that improvement with that team."
Van Gaal claimed his players were already starting to look tired following a busy run of fixtures, having battled to a 2-1 Champions League win over Wolfsburg on Wednesday.
"The solution is recovery, recovery, recovery," he continued. "That is why it is so difficult to prepare for the match against Arsenal. We have to see how the evaluation is from my fatigue specialist."
Van Gaal also revealed key midfielder Michael Carrick has been passed fit to play in the game.
"Carrick can play so I have a choice," he said. "I am happy to say that there are no injuries from Wednesday night."
